\title{GameHub}
\date{Nov 29, 2024}

\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index::doc}}


\sphinxAtStartPar
Game Hub is online service for digital distribution of computer games and programs

\sphinxAtStartPar
Main features:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
User authentication system

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
User profiles with avatars

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Storing password hashes for security

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Personal account

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Library of purchased games

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Shopping system

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Information about the development companies

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Communication of studios and games

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Name, price, detailed description, link to the developer studio, cover for games

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Tag system for categorizing games

\end{itemize}


\chapter{Project structure:}
\label{\detokenize{index:project-structure}}
\sphinxstepscope


\section{store\sphinxhyphen{}service}
\label{\detokenize{store-service:store-service}}\label{\detokenize{store-service::doc}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Store\sphinxhyphen{}service is the service responsible for managing the game store and related operations.


\subsection{database}
\label{\detokenize{store-service:database}}

\subsubsection{db\_api.py}
\label{\detokenize{store-service:module-db_api}}\label{\detokenize{store-service:db-api-py}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!db\_api@\spxentry{db\_api}}\index{db\_api@\spxentry{db\_api}!module@\spxentry{module}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Database operations module for the game store. This module provides functions for database initialization and data retrieval operations.

\sphinxAtStartPar

\end{description}

\subsection{routes}

\subsubsection{routes.py}
\label{\detokenize{store-service:module-routes}}\label{\detokenize{store-service:routes-py}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!routes@\spxentry{routes}}\index{routes@\spxentry{routes}!module@\spxentry{module}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Module routes defines the routes and their corresponding view functions.
It handles page rendering and navigation.
\index{main\_page() (in module routes)@\spxentry{main\_page()}\spxextra{in module routes}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{store-service:routes.main_page}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret
{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{routes.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{main\_page}}}
{}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Render the main store page.

\sphinxAtStartPar
This route handles both the root (‘/’) and ‘/store’ path.
It displays a list of all available games.
\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Returns:}
\sphinxAtStartPar
str:  Rendered HTML template for the store page with list of games

\end{description}

\end{fulllineitems}
